page.title: 07SERVICES PAGE 2
page.content:
Refuse collection weekly on a Monday to Gammersgill & Horsehouse, access is too difficult to Arkleside & Swineside therefore the residents either take to the nearest collection point or dispose of it personally.
Bus service ONE per week Fridays to market, leaving Horsehouse 10.30am returnimg from Leyburn 2.15pm Fare Â£1.34 return per Senior Citizen. If the Doctor is needed a 10mile journey to Leyburn. Same for Dentist. Should an Ambulance be needed this can take up to 45_60mins. to arrive and then a 28mile journey to the Hospital in Northallerton another 45mins. Mobile Libuary Van comes fortnightly to Horsehouse. During bad weather the Council clear the roads only in sever weather is the main road blocked longer than 24hrs.
